name: Potato Buns
instructions: cut potatoes and boil for 10 minutes. reserve 60g potato water. mash potatoes and butter. add to flour then add egg, salt, yeast, sugar, and potato water. knead for 5-10 minutes. let rise for 30-45 mins then shape into 9 balls. rise another 45 mins - 1 hour then bake for 15-18 mins at 375.
